dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.4wh8db
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Kazakhstan", "TaxonKey is Parus major Linnaeus, 1758" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 3 records from Birds of Northern Eurasia 39 records from Birds and Mammals Collections of the Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University 1 records from IPAE egg clutches collection (Aves) 4 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 2621 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 5 records from NABU|naturgucker 34 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 5 records from INSDC Sequences 5 records from UWBM Ornithology Collection 46 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 134 records from RU-BIRDS.RU, Birds observations database from Russia and neighboring regions. Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University. 4 records from Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Ornithology Collection 1 records from Vertebrates of the Gothenburg Natural History Museum (GNM) 44 records from Hatikka.fi observations 238 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
